item.title: Day 2
item.description: Day 2 Hugo and Kiss theme seems to be working good. Now working on my markdown skills, need to say Markdown Mastery: Simple yet Powerful Writing Format by Jason Taylor is pretty good.

item.title: resources
item.description: Resources List of video trainings, books, audiobooks: title author added date status Markdown Mastery: Simple yet Powerful Writing Format Jason Taylor 2021-03-29

item.title: Day 1 - playing with Github, Hugo and Kiss theme
item.description: Day 1 Working on setting up a small site based on Hugo and Github Pages. This works great. It’s like 30 minutes and basic site is up and running.
